ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh, I m level 11 and will settle for banded.  [bats eyelashes and smiles sweetly]  ;^) My bard hasn t gotten begged since her name went blue.  My rogue s
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Rebecca Small [mailto:macha_nabaob@...]

> The latest newbie beg: I have gotten tells twice now from
> bards under L10
> asking if I would mind getting them a set of lambent armor.
> That would be
> taking generosity to new heights.

Heh, I'm level 11 and will settle for banded. [bats eyelashes and smiles
sweetly] ;^)

My bard hasn't gotten begged since her name went blue. My rogue's name is
still purple though and she still gets begged. Heck, don't these people
know patchwork and bucklers when they see them?

> L51! woohoo travel song is fun, but pulling with it even sung
> kills pets.

Congrats!

Peace
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
